attributes.action: Seek to have Tony Blair charged with war crimes for his part in the death of hundreds of thousands of Civilians in Iraq.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair lied about the reasons he went into Iraq. He now says he would have gone in anyway to cause "regime change".  This shows he deliberately looked for an excuse to go to war.  He is worse than Mladic or Karadic in Bosnia, and should be in the dock at the Hague court.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
